channel.description: Recent content in new business on Damien Saunders

item.title: Required Summer Reading for startups & product development
item.description: If you’re about to head off for some sun – do pack these 2 books so you can say you seriously did some ‘work’. Why Do I need to know these books? You need to know about current tools and the best practices as they are already appearing in many business plans, marketing strategy or new product definitions. If you evaluate startups and are not getting a business model canvas then you should tell them to go re-write their business pan.
